lead_paragraph: A Buffalo Bills prospective ownership group that includes rocker Jon Bon Jovi has conducted a feasibility study into buying the NFL franchise and building a stadium in Toronto, a person close to the situation said.

headline.main: AP Source: NFL Stadium Sites Explored in Toronto
headline.print_headline: AP Source: NFL Stadium Sites Explored in Toronto

snippet: A Buffalo Bills prospective ownership group that includes rocker Jon Bon Jovi has conducted a feasibility study into buying the NFL franchise and building a stadium in Toronto, a person close to the situation said....
